Text.Page:
There is little time for sentimentality. Lives have been lost but if we do not work quickly, it will be for naught.

That's simply not acceptable.

These cultists and their nagas threaten everything! If we fail here, so many deaths will have no meaning.

We cannot be deterred, and the Scions of Lok will rue the day they opposed the Mysterium.

Giant Kumases and Kobolds are marching towards the Research Center. If you're ready, I can transport you immediately to the Defense Shield.<TEXTBUTTON>Protect Sanctum Mysterium</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Enter Defense Shield</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
